content.rendered:
Season Subscriptions

Pasadena Series* ($110)
Sundays at 4:00pm
February 10, March 17, May 5, June 2
SAVE $26 with each subscription!
Purchase tickets online

UCLA Faculty Center Series* ($110)
Tuesdays at 8:00pm
February 12, March 19, May 7, June 4
SAVE $26 with each subscription!
Purchase tickets online

Private Home Series* ($194)
February 9, March 16, May 4, June 1
SAVE $42 with each subscription!
reception following each concert
Purchase tickets online

Mix-and-Match Series*
Buy a set of all four programs, combining any locations, and receive 20% off the total combined single ticket price for each complete set.
Available online, by phone, or mail order. (213) 534-3434
Purchase tickets online

Three-Program Series*
Buy a set of any three different programs, combining any locations, and receive 15% off the total combined single ticket price for each set.
Available online, by phone, or mail order. (213) 534-3434
Purchase tickets online

Single Tickets

Purchase tickets online

Tickets for Pasadena and UCLA Faculty Center are $34** each and interchangeable.

Tickets for the New West Hollywood Library are $32** each.

Tickets for our Private Home concerts (and reception after the performance) are $59** each.

Discounts

Full-time Students: $5 at the West Hollywood Library with ID, available at the door only.

(Our season subscription prices reflect a discount and are a great value!)

Ordering

You may order tickets online or by calling us at (213) 534-3434. We appreciate your support!

Handling Charge
*For each subscription or series add $3.00.
**For all other orders, add $2.00/ticket.
